_comment: Auto-generated from gg-hub/projects/manifest.json - do not edit manually

spawnOptions.label: gg-hub Portfolio
spawnOptions.description: Browser-based portfolio and development workspace with integrated terminals. Features project management, xterm.js terminals with tmux support, and project-based terminal workflows.

spawnOptions.label: 3D Matrix Cards
spawnOptions.description: Interactive 3D card display system with Matrix-style effects. Features multiple layouts, touch controls, and realistic card rendering.

spawnOptions.label: Matrix Cards
spawnOptions.description: Cyberpunk-themed React card components featuring Matrix and Neon Glass styles. Plans for 3D casino/game hall experience.

spawnOptions.label: Sleak Card Component
spawnOptions.description: Modern React card system with water effects, flip animations, and multiple color variants. Mobile-optimized with playing card proportions.

spawnOptions.label: GGPrompts
spawnOptions.description: AI prompt management platform with real-time collaboration, template system, and community features. Built with React and Supabase.

spawnOptions.label: GGPrompts Style Guide
spawnOptions.description: Comprehensive design system and component library for GGPrompts. Interactive documentation with live examples and CSS architecture guidelines.

spawnOptions.label: 3D File System Viewer
spawnOptions.description: Advanced 3D file system with terminal interface, expandable sidebar, and working card flipping. Features FPS controls, holographic UI, and seamless file management.

spawnOptions.label: GGPrompts Professional
spawnOptions.description: Work-appropriate replica of GGPrompts with corporate-friendly interface. Full-stack React app with authentication, prompt management, and kanban organization.

spawnOptions.label: terminal-tabs (Tabz)
spawnOptions.description: Lightweight tab-based terminal interface built with React, TypeScript, and xterm.js. Spawn multiple terminals in browser tabs with full terminal emulation powered by a Node.js backend.

spawnOptions.label: terminal-tabs AI
spawnOptions.description: AI-enhanced version of terminal-tabs with intelligent features and automation. Experimental branch with AI-powered terminal assistance.

spawnOptions.label: DoodleDen
spawnOptions.description: Creative project built with React and Vite. Experimental creative workspace and doodling application.

spawnOptions.label: CellBlocks
spawnOptions.description: Full-stack cell-based application with React frontend and Node.js backend. Command library, prompts, and code snippets management system.

spawnOptions.label: Opustrator
spawnOptions.description: Simplified multi-agent orchestration system. Manage and coordinate multiple AI agents with a clean interface.

spawnOptions.label: tmux-manager (Web UI)
spawnOptions.description: Universal CLI tool and web interface for managing tmux sessions with rich metadata and API server. Replaces fragmented Node.js backends with clean, reusable solution where tmux is the database.

spawnOptions.label: TFE - Terminal File Explorer
spawnOptions.description: Powerful and clean terminal-based file explorer built with Go and Bubbletea. Features dual-pane preview, syntax highlighting, and integrated AI prompts library. Works beautifully on desktop and mobile (Termux).

spawnOptions.label: Tmuxplexer
spawnOptions.description: Modern TUI tmux session manager with workspace templates. Create complex tmux layouts instantly with beautiful Bubble Tea interface.

spawnOptions.label: tkan - Terminal Kanban Board
spawnOptions.description: Beautiful dual-view task management TUI with visual Kanban board and sortable table views. Integrates with GitHub Projects API for seamless project management.

spawnOptions.label: CellBlocksTUI
spawnOptions.description: Lightweight terminal interface for managing CellBlocks cards. Perfect for Termux mobile workflows with 5MB binary and ~10MB RAM usage.

spawnOptions.label: TUI Classics
spawnOptions.description: Nostalgic terminal games collection bringing back the classics - Minesweeper, Solitaire, 2048, Snake, Tanks, and a Balatro-like card game. Beautiful, fully-interactive TUI versions.

spawnOptions.label: Bit - ANSI Logo Designer
spawnOptions.description: Terminal ANSI logo designer and font library. Forked project enhanced with sidescrolling and background support for creating beautiful terminal art.
